unnormalised: Just a heads up for those new to the bazaar: While vendors often quote prices like "Rs 500" for a saree, remember that's just the starting point! Bargaining is key, and you can often get it down by 10-20%, sometimes even more if you're buying multiple items. Keep an eye out for deals like "buy 2 get 1 free" – though double-check the original prices first. Also, many smaller shops only accept cash (₹), so don't rely solely on your UPI or card. And don't be afraid to walk away; often, they'll call you back with a better offer!
